name: colorful-chat
description: Allows for auto-assignment and changing of name color chat roles
author: astrsk

cooldown.description: Cooldown between command runs in seconds to prevent role spam.

commands.name: changecolor
commands.description: Change your current chat color role

args.name: color
args.description: name of the color role to change to

commands.name: namecolors
commands.description: Displays the currently available color roles to select from
